title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitches on plain weave foundation
description: With a curving strawberry border text: "Blest truth descend and dwell within my heart/ O shed thy beams and never more depart/ Then when of self or others I may speak/ My words shall be sincere and kind and meek."  Then a signature.
name: Sampler
